price: It was not long before the hoopoe came and said, “I have learned something that you do not know; I come to you from Sheba with sure news.
arabic: فَمَكَثَ غَيۡرَ بَعِيدٖ فَقَالَ أَحَطتُ بِمَا لَمۡ تُحِطۡ بِهِۦ وَجِئۡتُكَ مِن سَبَإِۭ بِنَبَإٖ يَقِينٍ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
